languages.text: {n}Кибелла резко поворачивается к алым брызгам на полу и стенах храма. Ее зрачки расширяются, угрожая утопить радужку во тьме, лицо становится отрешенным, а голос — глухим и чужим.{/n} "Этой кровью начертан узор возмездия. Тот, кто пролил ее, появился позже, двигался быстро и яростно, не чувствовал ран... Блюститель, пришедший на стрельбу и узревший святотатство? Вероятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла резко поворачивается к алым брызгам на полу и стенах храма. Ее зрачки расширяются, угрожая утопить радужку во тьме, лицо становится отрешенным, а голос — глухим и чужим.{/n} "Здесь безжалостная и твердая рука пролила предательскую кровь… Блюститель, что пришел на звуки выстрелов и нес смерть еретикам". {n}Стальной коготь Кибеллы тянется к россыпи капель на полу.{/n} "И иной след, прерывистый, вопящий от ужаса. В нем нет скверны — то был невинный, бегущий в поисках спасения".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла резко поворачивается к алым брызгам на полу и стенах храма. Ее зрачки расширяются, угрожая утопить радужку во тьме, лицо становится отрешенным, а голос — глухим и чужим.{/n} "Этой кровью начертан узор возмездия. Тот, кто пролил ее, появился позже, двигался быстро и яростно, не чувствовал ран... Блюститель, пришедший на стрельбу и узревший святотатство? Вероятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

"Much can be gleaned from blood." {n}Kibellah points to the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine.{/n} "I look at the traces and see what has transpired here. There is a mark that is both ruthless and clear, it was left by an enforcer who came at the sound of gunshots and prowled around, looking for rioters. A different trail, both intermittent and full of terror, was left by one of the victims after she bolted, fearing for her life."

{n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

"Much can be gleaned from blood." {n}Kibellah points to the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine.{/n} "I look at the traces, and I can see what transpired here. Over there is a mark that is both ruthless and clear, left by an enforcer who hurried over at the sound of gunshots and then prowled around while looking for the rioters. A different trail, both intermittent and full of terror, was left by one of the victims after she bolted, fearing for her life."

The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah wendet sich mit einer schnellen Bewegung den Blutspritzern auf dem Boden und an den Wänden des Schreins zu. Ihre Pupillen weiten sich und hüllen ihre Augen in Dunkelheit. Sie wirkt entrückt und erklärt mit einer tiefen und seltsamen Stimme:{/n} "Dieses Blut bildet ein Muster der Vergeltung. Der, der es vergoss, zeigte sich erst später. Er bewegte sich flink und wütend, ohne seine eigenen Wunden zu spüren ... Ein Enforcer, der von Schüssen angelockt und Zeuge des Sakrilegs wurde? Vermutlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

Ihre Pupillen weiten sich und hüllen ihre Augen in Dunkelheit. Sie wirkt entrückt und erklärt mit einer tiefen und seltsamen Stimme:{/n} "Dieses Blut bildet ein Muster der Vergeltung. Der, der es vergoss, zeigte sich erst später. Er bewegte sich flink und wütend, ohne seine eigenen Wunden zu spüren ... Ein Enforcer, der von Schüssen angelockt und Zeuge des Sakrilegs wurde? Vermutlich."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se da la vuelta en dirección a las salpicaduras de color escarlata que hay en el suelo y las paredes del santuario. Se le dilatan las pupilas hasta el punto de ahogar sus iris en oscuridad, su expresión se torna distante y, su voz, grave y extraña:{/n} "La sangre tiene un patrón de retribución. Quien la derramó volvió después, se movió con rapidez, con furia e insensible ante sus propias heridas... ¿Sería un guardia que escuchó los disparos y presenció este acto? Podría ser".
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

Se le dilatan las pupilas hasta el punto de ahogar sus iris en oscuridad, su expresión se torna distante y, su voz, grave y extraña:{/n} "La sangre tiene un patrón de retribución. Quien la derramó volvió después, se movió con rapidez, con furia e insensible ante sus propias heridas... ¿Sería un guardia que escuchó los disparos y presenció este acto? Podría ser".

languages.text: {n}キベラは神殿の地面や壁についた深紅の飛沫へと素早く顔を向ける。その瞳孔は開き、虹彩が暗闇に覆われる。表情は遠いものになり、声は低く奇妙な響きを持つ。{/n}「この血は報復の模様として描かれました。これを流した者は、後からやってきた。彼らは自分たちの傷にも気づかず素早く激しく動いた…おそらく、エンフォーサーが銃声に引き寄せられて、冒涜的な行為を目にした」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは神殿の地面や壁についた深紅の飛沫へと素早く顔を向ける。その瞳孔は開き、虹彩が暗闇に覆われる。表情は遠いものになり、声は低く奇妙な響きを持つ。{/n}「この血は報復の模様として描かれました。これを流した者は、後からやってきた。彼らは自分たちの傷にも気づかず素早く激しく動いた…おそらく、エンフォーサーが銃声に引き寄せられて、冒涜的な行為を目にした」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈猛地转过了身，凝视着圣殿地板与墙壁上的猩红色血迹。她的瞳孔放大了，几乎要将虹膜淹没在黑暗之中。她的表情变得疏离，声音也变得低沉、古怪。{/n}“泼洒这些血迹的人，心怀报复的渴望，是后来才抵达的。那个人动作迅速，满心狂暴，根本不在意自己的伤势……会不会是某个执法者听到了枪声，之后赶到这里，亲眼目睹了这样的亵渎行为？或许是。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈猛地转过了身，凝视着圣殿地板与墙壁上的猩红色血迹。她的瞳孔放大了，几乎要将虹膜淹没在黑暗之中。她的表情变得疏离，声音也变得低沉、古怪。{/n}“泼洒这些血迹的人，心怀报复的渴望，是后来才抵达的。那个人动作迅速，满心狂暴，根本不在意自己的伤势……会不会是某个执法者听到了枪声，之后赶到这里，亲眼目睹了这样的亵渎行为？或许是。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se tourne brusquement pour observer les éclaboussures écarlates sur le sol et les murs du sanctuaire. Ses pupilles se dilatent, menaçant de noyer ses iris dans un océan de ténèbres, son expression se fait distante et elle reprend la parole d'une étrange voix de basse :{/n} « Le motif tracé avec ce sang évoque un châtiment. Celui qui l'a versé est arrivé plus tard. Il s'est hâté, et la fureur l'a rendu insensible à ses propres blessures... Un prévôt attiré par la fusillade aurait été témoin du sacrilège ? Peut-être bien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution. The one who spilt it appeared later. They moved swiftly and furiously, numb to their own wounds... An enforcer who was drawn to the gunfire and witnessed the sacrilege? Probably."

Ses pupilles se dilatent, menaçant de noyer ses iris dans un océan de ténèbres, son expression se fait distante et elle reprend la parole d'une étrange voix de basse :{/n} « Le motif tracé avec ce sang évoque un châtiment. Celui qui l'a versé est arrivé plus tard. Il s'est hâté, et la fureur l'a rendu insensible à ses propres blessures... Un prévôt attiré par la fusillade aurait été témoin du sacrilège ? Peut-être bien. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, yüzünü hızla mabedin zeminine ve duvarlarına sıçrayan kızıl izlere çeviriyor. İrislerini karanlığa gömme tehdidi taşıyan göz bebekleri büyüyor, ifadesi kayıtsız bir hâl alıyor, sesine alçak ve tuhaf bir ton hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Bu kan, intikam motifiyle dökülmüş. Kanı döken, daha sonra ortaya çıkmış. Kendi yaralarına aldırış etmeden serice ve öfkeyle hareket etmiş. Silah seslerine yönelmiş ve hürmetsizliğe tanık olmuş bir infazcı mı bu? Muhtemelen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah sharply turns to face the crimson splashes on the floor and walls of the shrine. Her pupils dilate, threatening to drown her irises in darkness, her expression turns distant, her voice becoming low and strange:{/n} "This blood is drawn in a pattern of retribution.
